name: celestially
content:
celestially adverb
(RELATING TO SKY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the sky or things outside this world: Celestially speaking, the biggest event is the Geminid meteor shower on Monday night. The observatory's work is mainly focused on answering the questions of the celestially curious.
More examplesFewer examplesCelestially themed objects hang from the ceiling of the classroom.
celestially adverb
(EXTREMELY)
extremely and strangely, in a way that does not seem to belong to this world: Her celestially radiant voice was a constant source of wonder. He is a celestially gifted athlete.
More examplesFewer examplesGroups of celestially blond students laughed, joked, and drank water.
